attributes.action: To give Alex Tattie Marshall a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: As well as his fantastic achievement's in the Commonwealth games, Alex has won world titles, national titles, helped young bowlers with coaching and supported the sport of bowls his whole adult life, a true credit to the game.
attributes.background:
Alex Marshall has become the most successful bowler in the history of the Commonwealth games when he won his 5th gold medal, to go along with his silver medal.
he is a credit to the sport of bowls, respected world wide, always willing to give his support to bowlers from all corners of the globe.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
